mapper.sql: jinFeiID, xueShengZuZhiXinXiID, sheTuanXinXiID, jinE, yongTu, shenQingRen, shenQingShiJian, shiFouPiZhun, piZhunRen, piZhunShiJian
mapper.select:
select
from shetuanjingfei where sheTuanXinXiID = #{shetuanxinxiid,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by jinFeiID DESC

select
from shetuanjingfei WHERE ( ( sheTuanXinXiID IN ( SELECT sheTuanXinXiID FROM shetuanxinxi WHERE shetuanxinxi.sheTuanID IN ( SELECT shetuanid FROM shetuanjibenxinxi WHERE shetuanjibenxinxi.xueXiaoID = #{xuexiaoid} ) ) ) OR ( xueShengZuZhiXinXiID IN ( SELECT xueShengZuZhiXinXiID FROM xueshengzuzhixinxi WHERE xueShengZuZhiID IN ( SELECT xueshengzuzhiid FROM xueshengzuzhijibenxinxi WHERE xueshengzuzhijibenxinxi.xueXiaoID = #{xuexiaoid} ) ) ) ) order by jinFeiID DESC

select
from shetuanjingfei where xueShengZuZhiXinXiID = #{xueshengzuzhixinxiid,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by jinFeiID DESC
mapper.insert: insert into shetuanjingfei (xueShengZuZhiXinXiID, sheTuanXinXiID, jinE, yongTu, shenQingRen, shenQingShiJian, shiFouPiZhun) values (#{xueshengzuzhixinxiid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shetuanxinxiid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{jine,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{yongtu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shenqingren,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shenqingshijian,jdbcType=DATE}, 0)

mapper.update:
update shetuanjingfei
xueShengZuZhiID = #{xueshengzuzhiid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sheTuanID = #{shetuanid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
jinE = #{jine,jdbcType=INTEGER},
yongTu = #{yongtu,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
shenQingRen = #{shenqingren,jdbcType=INTEGER},
shenQingShiJian = #{shenqingshijian,jdbcType=DATE},
shiFouPiZhun = #{shifoupizhun,jdbcType=BIT},
piZhunRen = #{pizhunren,jdbcType=INTEGER},
piZhunShiJian = #{pizhunshijian,jdbcType=DATE},
where jinFeiID = #{jinfeiid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update shetuanjingfei set xueShengZuZhiXinXiID = #{xueshengzuzhixinxiid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sheTuanXinXiID = #{shetuanxinxiid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, jinE = #{jine,jdbcType=INTEGER}, yongTu = #{yongtu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shenQingRen = #{shenqingren,jdbcType=INTEGER}, shenQingShiJian = #{shenqingshijian,jdbcType=DATE}, shiFouPiZhun = #{shifoupizhun,jdbcType=BIT}, piZhunRen = #{pizhunren,jdbcType=INTEGER}, piZhunShiJian = #{pizhunshijian,jdbcType=DATE} where jinFeiID = #{jinfeiid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
